Openpay.PaymentNotAssociatedOrderForm: Payment must be associated with an order form.
Openpay.OpenpaySettingsError: Error in Openpay Payment settings. Please contact site's administrator.
Openpay.InvalidCustomerInfo: Billing or Shipping address are lacking of info. Please make sure to fill in Line1, City, Region and PostalCode.
Openpay.FailureMessage: There was an error with Openpay transaction. Please try again
Openpay.PaymentCaptureError: There's some failures occur during the Openpay capture payment process.
Openpay.PlanPurchasePriceCompareError: There's some failures occur during the comparision payment information with Openpay.
Openpay.EpiCreateCaptureTransactionError: Your order have created successfully but some errors occur in capture order. Please contact site's administrator about this notification !
Openpay.ProcessPaymentStatusCompleted: This order has already paid in Openpay Payment.
Openpay.InvalidPurchasePrice: Openpay is only available for amounts between ${0} and ${1}
Openpay.IncludeProhibitedProduct: This order include products prohibited by Openpay Payment policy.
Openpay.OpenpayRefundError: Errors occurred. Refund transaction cannot be completed.
Openpay.RefundMoreThanPurchasePrice: New Purchase Price is greater than current Purchase Price.
Openpay.GetOrderStatusApiError: Cannot get order status from Openpay API.
Openpay.NotEnoughStockWarning: Payment completed but not enough stock. Please contact administrators.
Openpay.CartValidationWarning: An error occurred when processing cart.
Openpay.PlanStatusIsNotActive: Openpay plan must be Active for this feature to apply.
